content: I foolishly followed the instructions under "Create a Zulip organization and login" before remembering I had a script to set up the realm I wanted. Now I've created a user (who I guess is the admin of the realm) with an email address (mine) that I want to create a user for in the new realm. What's the least painful way of fixing this?
If I just find where my email address is in the database and change it to some other value, will that break anything?
though there seems to be a cache
Cool. We're working on fixing the t that changing emails is super painful :)
